existing_features.title: Update subject abbreviation generation so that the word "and" is not used when deriving abbreviations, and the word "through" is handled with a custom rule instead of the default "first letter of each word" behavior.

Add unit tests (or equivalent lightweight test coverage used in this codebase) for deriveSubjectAbbreviation covering: normal multi-word names, names containing "and", names containing "through", and mixed-case inputs.

new_feature_requests.summary: Adjust abbreviation generation rules to exclude words like "and" and handle "through" differently
